name: Mohd Rayyan
bio: Developer skilled in Java, data structures and algorithms, and full-stack development (MERN). Proficient in SQL, RESTful APIs, and scalable application development. Currently interning at Juspay as a Product Solution Engineer.
about: Product Solution Engineer at Juspay working on backend services, API debugging, and performance optimization in real-time transaction systems. MERN stack developer with strong algorithmic problem-solving skills and experience in payment infrastructure.
longAbout: I'm a B.Tech Information Technology student at Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology with a CGPA of 8.71, currently working as a Product Solution Engineer Intern at Juspay since July 2025. At Juspay, I manage payment infrastructure for  international merchants, design and implement RESTful APIs for payments, refunds, and checkout SDKs, and collaborate with product and engineering teams to develop real-time payment solutions. My technical expertise spans full-stack development using the MERN stack, Java for Data Structures and Algorithms, and payment technologies including Payment Gateways, Merchant Onboarding, and Transaction Flows. I have solved 600+ DSA problems on LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills. My projects include InsightCRM (AI-powered CRM with Gemini AI), RayyanEstate (full-stack real estate platform), and Sign Language Learner (ML-based web app), showcasing practical applications of my technical skills. I led a team to achieve Top 5 in the NSUT National Hackathon and actively contribute to real-time payment solutions in production environments.
